melting.approximativeMethods

Class ApproximativeMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • melting.approximativeMethods.ApproximativeMode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MeltingComputationMethod
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ahsen01, MarmurChester62_93, MarmurSchildkrautDoty, Owen69, Santalucia98, Wetmur91

    public class ApproximativeMode
extends Object
implements MeltingComputationMethod
    This class represents the approximative model. It implements the MelitngComputationMethod Interface.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Environment environment
      environment containing the sequences, ion and agent concentrations and the options (default options and options entered by the user)
      protected RegisterMethods register
      RegisterMethods register : registers all the pattern computation methods implemented by Melting

      • computesThermodynamics

        public ThermoResult computesThermodynamics()
        Description copied from interface: MeltingComputationMethod
        This method is called to compute the melting temperature.
        Specified by:
        computesThermodynamics in interface MeltingComputationMethod
        Returns:
        ThermoResult containing the computed enthalpy, entropy and melting temperature.

      • isApplicable

        public boolean isApplicable()
        Description copied from interface: MeltingComputationMethod
        This method is called to check that the options entered by the users are applicable with the used model (class).
        Specified by:
        isApplicable in interface MeltingComputationMethod
        Returns:
        false if at least one chosen option makes the model completely false. If one chosen option may lead to less reliable results, a warning message will appear. (ex : wrong hybridization type)

      • setUpVariables

        public void setUpVariables(HashMap<String,String> options)
        Description copied from interface: MeltingComputationMethod
        Creates the Environment object and set up the variables of the chosen model.
        Specified by:
        setUpVariables in interface MeltingComputationMethod
        Parameters:
        options - containing all the options (default options and options entered by the user)

      • getRegister

        public RegisterMethods getRegister()
        Description copied from interface: MeltingComputationMethod

        Specified by:

        Returns:
        the RegisterMethod of the implemented class.

      • isNaEqPossible

        protected boolean isNaEqPossible()
        to check if a sodium equivalence is necessary. (when other ions are present)
        Returns:
        true if sodium equivalence is necessary.
